Dilwale.name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Dilwale.description: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

Shawshank.name: The Shawshank Redemption
Shawshank.description: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison,

Your.name: Your Name.
Your.description: High schoolers Mitsuha and Taki are complete strangers living separate lives. But one night, they suddenly switch places.

Godfather.name: The Godfather
Godfather.description: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family.

Kill.name: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
Kill.description: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody affair is a complete edit of the two part martial arts action films Kill Bill: Volume 1

Schindler.name: Schindler's List
Schindler.description: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory

Spirited.name: Spirited Away
Spirited.description: A young girl, Chihiro, becomes trapped in a strange new world of spirits. When her parents undergo a mysterious transformation

Fight.name: Fight Club
Fight.description: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy

Godfather2.name: The Godfather: Part II
Godfather2.description: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York.

Whiplash.name: Whiplash
Whiplash.description: Under the direction of a ruthless instructor, a talented young drummer begins to pursue perfection at any cost
